name: Journey_of_coding
body:
**This website is all about:-**

     -how a novice coder ascends learning right from the basics facing challenges 
     -solutions to the problems faced during the same (for fellow novice coders ;) ) 
     -relatable discussions at the intersection of programming languages, 
      softwares for different purposes, web-dev AND "big buzzwords"!

You can read my first blog [here](www.prkfirstblog.com).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
